items.title: Bengals defensive back Cam Taylor-Britt injured vs Steelers in NFL Week 11
items.summary: Cincinnati Bengals defensive back Cam Taylor-Britt was injured during the team's NFL Week 11 game against Pittsburgh.

items.title: Why isn't Terry Bradshaw on Fox's NFL show today?
items.summary: It's rare that we don't see Terry Bradshaw talking about the NFL for Fox. Here's why that was the case on Sunday.

items.title: NFL boss lauds Madrid as Dolphins edge Commanders at Bernabeu
items.summary: NFL looks set to return to Spain in the future after the sport's commissioner lauded Madrid, which played host to the Miami Dolphins' 16-13 overtime win over the Washington Commanders on Sunday. The world's top American Football league has a record seven international games this season after first regular-season visits to Spain, Ireland and Berlin to complement usual trips to London and Brazil.

items.title: Best, worst of NFL Week 11: Answering big questions from Madrid and more
items.summary: Our NFL Nation reporters answer the biggest questions from each game. Here's what we learned from Week 11.

items.summary: We have NFL draft notes through CFB Week 12, including why Zachariah Branch and Makai Lemon are intriguing prospects.

items.summary: NFL stars didn't just show up to play -- they showed up in style. Here are this week's best looks.

items.title: Ranking top free agents in line to get PAID this offseason
items.summary: We listed the NFL's top 25 pending free agents and gave intel on who might return to their current team.

items.title: Can Giants interim coach Mike Kafka make it work in New York?
items.summary: The Giants (2-8) and the rest of the NFL will be looking at how Kafka can help the team over the final two months of the season.

items.title: Colts’ DeForest Buckner turned to stem cell treatment to address neck injury
items.summary: INDIANAPOLIS – DeForest Buckner has taken a familiar approach in his attempt to return from a neck injury. The Indianapolis Colts’ veteran defensive tackle posted on social media Friday that he traveled to Panama this week to receive stem cell injections as part of his treatment for a neck injury that resulted in him being [...]

items.title: AFC Playoff Picture: Colts lose top spot on their bye week
items.summary: The Indianapolis Colts are on the bye in Week 11, and while they entered it in first place in the AFC, they have already lost their position after one game. The New England Patriots became the first nine-win team in the NFL on Thursday night, defeating the New York Jets, and taking sole possession of […]

items.title: What’s not to love about Colts’ Tyler Warren?
items.summary: Shh…Don’t tell anyone, but Tyler Warren might be my favorite Colts player. Yes, Jonathan Taylor is stealing the headlines right now. Stealing…? Ok, not stealing, but you get the idea. All the talk is about Taylor and well deserved. He is ripping off huge runs, breaking franchise records, and carrying this team at times. The […]

items.title: Vote: are the Colts on the rise?
items.summary: Welcome to SB Nation Reacts, a survey of fans across the NFL. Throughout the year we ask questions of the most plugged-in Colts fans and fans across the country. Sign up here to participate in the weekly emailed surveys. Heading into Week 11, we want to know how you’re feeling after watching the team so […]

items.title: Colts Blue Zone Podcast 441: Bye Week Blitz
items.summary: With the Indianapolis Colts on the bye week, the Colts Blue Zone crew takes a look at what's worked so far this season and explores some areas where the team can improve as Indy hits the home stretch. At 8-2, the Colts sit atop the AFC South and boast one of the league's top offenses. [...]

items.title: Tyler Warren: All Pro Fullback?
items.summary: When the Commissioner Roger Goodell announced the Colts drafting Tyler Warren 15th overall in the 2025 draft, he did so with the usual customary addition of “insert position, insert university” that he does with all picks. The words “Tyler Warren, Tight End, Penn State” caused a thunderous roar of approval from both Colts fans watching […]

items.title: Week 10 Colts Film Breakdown: Big Time Win in Berlin
items.summary: International games can be the best or the worst—depending on the outcome of the game. If you win, there’s nothing like that flight back home. If you lose? It is MISERABLE. Luckily, the Colts under Shane Steichen have not had to experience that. I’ve said it before, but the NFL is a week to week […]

items.title: Colts RB Jonathan Taylor, Tyler Warren earn weekly PFF honors after BIG Berlin outings
items.summary: According to PFF, both Indianapolis Colts running back Jonathan Taylor and rookie tight end Tyler Warren were named to their ‘Week 10 Team of the Week’: Offense In particular, Taylor was named ‘PFF Offensive Player of the Week,’ which seems incredibly hard to disagree with given his insane outing overseas: Offensive Player of the Week: […]

items.title: What could Colts QB Daniel Jones next contract look like?

items.title: Colts’ Week 10 QB Analysis: Better, not great

items.title: Colts running back Jonathan Taylor claims third weekly honor this season after record-setting performance in Berlin
items.summary: The Olympic Stadium in Berlin has witnessed its share of historic feats over the past nine decades. Indianapolis Colts running back Jonathan Taylor turned the page to a new chapter on a global stage Sunday, with a performance that will be remembered as one of the greatest individual showcases of the modern NFL era. Taylor […]

items.title: Report: Colts WR Alec Pierce could warrant $20M annually
items.summary: According to ESPN’s Jeremy Fowler, Indianapolis Colts wide receiver Alec Pierce could warrant upwards of $20M/year in a new deal this upcoming offseason: “Teams I’ve talked to anticipate [Alec] Pierce will hit a big number in free agency. They think the $20 million per year threshold isn’t out of the question for him. Pierce is […]

items.title: Colts’ Jonathan Taylor AFC Offensive Player of the Week
items.summary: INDIANAPOLIS – The honors keep flowing in for Jonathan Taylor. The Indianapolis Colts’ veteran running back has been named AFC Offensive Player of the Week after being the catalyst for Sunday’s 31-25 overtime win over the Atlanta Falcons in Berlin. Taylor rushed 32 times for 244 yards and three touchdowns and added three receptions for [...]

items.title: Matt Taylor discusses calling Colts game in Berlin
items.summary: The Indianapolis Colts came away with a thrilling 31-25 overtime win against the Atlanta Falcons. This was anything but a typical NFL matchup, as the team traveled to Germany for a "home game." Matt Taylor, radio voice of the Colts, appeared on FOX59 Morning News to discuss the unique experience of calling the Nov. 9 [...]

items.title: Colts, Kicking The Stigma encourage fans to focus on mental health during bye week
items.summary: The Colts' digital and social media channels will not publish content between Wednesday morning and Monday morning, and we encourage fans to take disconnect from devices during the bye week as well.

items.title: Colts hit bye at 8-2, but Daniel Jones’ protection must  be addressed; had lost 10 straight giving up 7 sacks
items.summary: INDIANAPOLIS – Three bits of reality followed the Indianapolis Colts back home from Berlin and into their bye week. Item 1: At 8-2, they’re the No. 1 seed in the AFC and have created separation in the AFC South with 5-4 Jacksonville and 4-5 Houston. Item 2: Jonathan Taylor has positioned himself to be the first running [...]

items.title: 5 Colts Things: More context for Jonathan Taylor's 17 touchdowns, plus Tyler Warren, Daniel Jones, Zaire Franklin and special teams make key plays to push Colts to 8-2 at bye week
items.summary: The Colts' 31-25 overtime win over the Atlanta Falcons on Sunday sent them into their bye week with an 8-2 record and a 2.5-game lead in the AFC South.

items.title: Around the AFC South: Texans score 26 points in fourth quarter to take down Jaguars
items.summary: With their overtime win over the Falcons on Sunday, the 8-2 Colts remain firmly in first place in the AFC South.

items.title: Colts Blue Zone Podcast 440: Overtime Insanity as Colts Top Falcons
items.summary: The Indianapolis Colts won a thriller in Berlin. Matt Adams recaps the game in the latest Blue Zone Podcast. Find the Colts Blue Zone Podcast on YouTube, Apple Podcasts or Spotify.

items.title: Colts fans from all over the world deliver remarkable atmosphere in Berlin before, during and after incredible overtime win over Falcons
items.summary: Colts fans from several continents descended upon Berlin this week to create a special environment of different cultures coming together because of one central thing: A love and passion for the Indianapolis Colts.

items.title: Jonathan Taylor nominated for Week 10 FedEx Ground Player of the Week
items.summary: Taylor recorded 286 scrimmage yards (244 rushing, 44 receiving) and three rushing touchdowns in the Colts' OT win over the Falcons.

items.title: Statement from the Indianapolis Colts
Colts’ follow record-setting Jonathan Taylor to OT win over Falcons in Berlin’s historic Olympic Stadium
items.summary: INDIANAPOLIS – The Indianapolis Colts went international. Jonathan Taylor went off. “Look,’’ said Zaire Franklin. “I’ll scream it from the mountaintops. “He’s the MVP in my book.’’ “It’s phenomenal the way he’s been running,’’ added Shane Steichen. In the NFL’s first game at Berlin’s historic Olympic Stadium on Sunday, Taylor’s brilliance carried the Colts when [...]

items.title: Sauce Gardner makes immediate impact in Colts debut
items.summary: Gardner just met his new teammates and coaches on Wednesday, but already fit in seamlessly as he helped the Colts secure an overtime win over the Atlanta Falcons on Sunday.

items.title: Jonathan Taylor takes historic season to international stage with 3-touchdown, record-breaking, walk-off performance vs. Falcons
items.summary: Taylor rushed for 244 yards and three touchdowns in the Colts' 31-25 win over the Atlanta Falcons on Sunday at Olympic Stadium in Berlin.

items.title: Taylor's touchdown in overtime propels Colts over Falcons in Berlin
items.summary: INDIANAPOLIS - Jonathan Taylor scored an eight-yard touchdown in overtime to lift the Indianapolis Colts to a 31-25 win over the Atlanta Falcons at the Olympic Stadium in Berlin on Sunday. Taylor had a monster day on the ground, gaining 244 yards and scoring three touchdowns as the Colts are now 8-2 and in the [...]

items.title: Jonathan Taylor's historic game fuels Colts' thrilling OT win vs. Falcons
items.summary: Taylor rushed for three touchdowns – including an 83-yarder in the fourth quarter and the game-winner in overtime – to set a new franchise record and propel the Colts to victory.

items.title: Colts RB Jonathan Taylor scores 65th career rushing touchdown to set new franchise record
items.summary: By scoring two rushing touchdowns on Sunday against the Atlanta Falcons, Taylor passed Pro Football Hall of Famer Edgerrin James to set a franchise record with 65 career rushing touchdowns.

items.title: Colts’ Reggie Wayne on Adonai Mitchell: I think AD was on track

The Indianapolis Colts so coveted Sauce Gardner leading up to Tuesday’s trade deadline that they agreed to send the New York Jets two first-round draft picks for their All-Pro [...]

items.title: Colts place DeForest Buckner on IR
items.summary: INDIANAPOLIS – The Indianapolis Colts’ defense has been delivered a significant blow. Tackle DeForest Buckner, a franchise cornerstone and interior anchor for Lou Anarumo’s defense, has been placed on the injured reserve list with a neck injury suffered in last Sunday’s loss at Pittsburgh. Coach Shane Steichen made the announcement after putting the Colts through [...]

items.title: Sauce Gardner: Trade to Colts ‘great situation’
items.summary: INDIANAPOLIS – Hopefully, a chaotic week is eased by eight-plus hours of peace and quiet on a chartered jet. At least, that’s Sauce Gardner’s hope. The All-Pro cornerback described his relocation from the New York Jets to the Indianapolis Colts as “the craziest 48 hours of my life.’’ Monday, Gardner was a $120 million cornerstone [...]

items.title: Alec Pierce and Sauce Gardner made each other better as Cincinnati Bearcats. Four years later, they can do the same thing Colts teammates
items.summary: Pierce and Gardner's daily competition on Cincinnati's practice field helped them both reach the NFL. Now, reunited as Colts teammates, they can help push each other even more.

Buckner suffered a neck injury in [...]

items.title: Team Sauce (Alec Pierce, Sauce Gardner) reunited by Colts’ blockbuster trade
items.summary: INDIANAPOLIS – Alec Pierce was quick to set the record straight. Despite what you’ve seen and heard, he never requested going one-on-one against Sauce Gardner while they were friends/ultra-competitive teammates at the University of Cincinnati. “I’m not completely sure where that quote came from,’’ Pierce said Wednesday afternoon. “I don’t know if I ever really [...]

items.title: How Daniel Jones, Colts offense can benefit from arrival of Sauce Gardner
items.summary: The Colts take pride in their ability to play complementary football, and Gardner’s presence will only help continue that trend.
